item.title: This chipmaker equipment stock could be a big beneficiary of Nvidia-Intel deal, says BofA
item.description: ASML is poised to grow as semiconductor equipment demand picks up, particularly following Nvidia and Intel's $5 billion deal, according to Bank of Ame...

item.title: Tesla gets upgrade from Baird as EV maker sets 'lofty' product targets
item.description: Tesla notched an upgraded stock rating from Baird following its unveiling of a nearly $1 trillion pay package for CEO Elon Musk.

item.title: Here are Friday's biggest analyst calls: Nvidia, Apple, Tesla, Intel, Micron, UPS, Stellantis, Toast, CoreWeave and more
item.description: Here are Friday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Intel gets a downgrade from Citi, which says Nvidia partnership impact will be limited
item.description: Intel is poised to fall as it struggles to compete with rivals, despite securing a $5 billion investment pledge from Nvidia, according to Citi.

item.title: SEC to propose rule change on Trump's call to end quarterly earnings reporting, says Chair Atkins
item.description: Atkins said if the rule change is approved, it will be left to companies to decide whether they switch to semiannual or stay with quarterly.
